title: John's Shout
description: In a world where the dead run and bite... they better stay dead!Episode 1:A kid, John, is running to get away from his zombie father.A woman, Luanne, will do anything to survive.A police officer, Derek, will try to keep people alive.Alec Bonowicz has the strongest survival card in miles.They find that in the land of the dead, you must cover yourself from the living too.Next Episode: First BloodA series by Dave Callahan.
author: Dave Callahan
